name: The Unknown Ivan the Terrible

Official site: extra to Criterion DVD box Eisenstein - the sound years - http://www.sprkfv.net/journal/three04/soundyears2.html

description: A reconstruction of the uncut prologue of Eisenstein's Ivan the Terrible, the scene with the gunners Foma and Erema and a fragment from the unfinished part 3 featuring the German knight Heinrich von Staden. In between stills and n...
